title: My Soulstealer Vayne Gone :(
body: Hey guys. just wondering i had a lil problem. i finally got my 10 gemstones to get soulstealer vayne. and when i put it together i tried to unlock it permanently but a service status kept appearing.. i kept retrying it and by mistake i dis enchanted my skin :( can anyone help on how to get it back or if its even possible?

replies.body:
Hey there,

You should [contact Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new), I am unsure if they will be able to assist in this case but its worth a shot.
